text: ==Events== * The book Wuthering Heights is published * February 22 – The Battle of Buena Vista in the Mexican–American War * March 29 – Veracruz is taken by General Winfield Scott * May 7 – The American Medical Association is founded * July 24 – The Mormon pioneers under Brigham Young arrive in Salt Lake City to begin settling Utah. * July 26 – Liberia becomes a country ==Births== * February 11 – Thomas Edison * March 3 – Alexander Graham Bell * April 10 – Joseph Pulitzer * September 5 – Jesse James == Deaths == * March 11 – Johnny Appleseed * November 4 – Felix Mendelssohn
